com.enjin.sdk.utils.reflection

Class SafeField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enjin.sdk.utils.reflection.SafeField

  • public class SafeField
extends java.lang.Object
    Class providing for safe reflection of class fields.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SafeField(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Constructs a safe reflection field for the given field.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public <T> java.util.Optional<T> get(java.lang.Object instance,
                                     java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Gets the value assigned to the instance field and casts it to the provided type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to cast to
        Parameters:
        instance - the object instance
        type - the value type
        Returns:
        empty optional if unable to get value or value is null, else wrapped value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the Field object is enforcing Java language access control and the underlying field is inaccessible
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified object is not an instance of the class or interface declaring the underlying field (or a subclass or implementor thereof)

      • getStatic

        public <T> java.util.Optional<T> getStatic(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Gets the value assigned to a class field and casts it to the provided type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to cast to
        Parameters:
        type - the value type
        Returns:
        empty optional if unable to get value or value is null, else wrapped value

      • getField

        public java.lang.reflect.Field getField()
        Returns:
        the field
